_source.short_desc: Transcepta is the top AP automation solution to reduce AP costs, provide supply chain visibility, and control cash.
_source.long_desc: Transcepta is the top AP automation solution to reduce AP costs, provide supply chain visibility, and control cash. The AI-based platform establishes a digital supplier connection, automatically matches PO-based invoices without human intervention, and efficiently codes, routes, and approves non-PO invoices. Eliminate invoice exceptions and supplier payment inquiries. Easily manage supplier information such as W-9s, banking details, and contact information all from a single platform.
_source.target_audience: The Transcepta Platform is for any AP team that wants to eliminate the headaches associated with scanning, OCR, and other manual AP processes. Transcepta seamlessly connects to any ERP system.

category_features.name: Cataloging/Categorization
category_features.definition: Create and manage digital catalog of products/services with their details, specification, and price

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Fixed Asset Management
category_features.definition: Centralized database to track details of fixed assets such as depreciation and maintenance scheduling/history

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Invoice Processing
category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.name: Purchase Order Management
category_features.definition: Create, send, and track purchase orders and their statuses

category_features.name: Receiving/Putaway Management
category_features.definition: Manage process from initial receipt of a load to when it is stocked in its final destination within a warehouse

category_features.name: Requisition Management
category_features.definition: Review, approve and cancel requests for goods/services to be purchased

category_features.name: Sourcing Management
category_features.definition: Negotiate best prices and choose the right vendor for various purchases

category_features.name: Spend Management
category_features.definition: Track the amount of money spent on a certain product or with a certain supplier

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: 1099 Preparation
category_features.definition: Create and distribute 1099 tax forms to suppliers

category_features.name: Aging Tracking
category_features.definition: Pull a report on unpaid invoices that shows how much time has elapsed since the date of the invoice

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Check Writing
category_features.definition: Issue payments to third parties via checks

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Duplicate Payment Alert
category_features.definition: Receive an automatic notification when the same exact payment is about to be initiated for the second time

category_features.name: Electronic Funds Transfer
category_features.definition: Transfer money electronically between two bank accounts

category_features.name: Fraud Detection
category_features.definition: Identify and prevent suspicious activity

category_features.name: Invoice Processing
category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.name: PO Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Verify that invoices comply to the terms of pre-issued purchase orders prior to issuing payments

category_features.name: Recurring Payments
category_features.definition: Automate supplier payments on a predetermined schedule (monthly, quarterly, etc)

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of products.
related_products.features:
QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of your products as you sell and restock across multiple warehouse locations and channels. 

QuickBooks Commerce allows brands to automate and integrate their commerce platforms and get powerful insights into all their sales data on-demand.

related_products.short_desc: Procurement tools manage suppliers by automating numerous processes. Avoid stock-outs & overspending on excessive materials with Odoo.
related_products.features: Manage suppliers and purchase orders easily with Odoo. Odoo?s procurement tools are tailor-made to help users efficiently run their business with less stock, and ensures they avoid frustrating stock-outs. Easily configure ?Min-Max? stock quantities with Odoo?s user-friendly reordering rules, stock levels, sales forecasts, and automatic routes (Replenish on Order). Users can quickly import vendor price lists and lead times, in order to stay updated on products? pricing and shipping details.

related_products.short_desc: 360+ 4.7/5 reviews. Simple yet, fully featured. The highest rated procurement software.
related_products.features: Simple Procurement software that allows team members to create purchase requests on the go that can get approved by pre-defined approvers - from any device. All relevant comments & docs can get attached to the PO & managed for reporting & auditing. Eliminate spending mistakes & keep team members accountable for company card purchasing. View and manage budgets in real-time for insightful decision-making for each purchase. Draw accurate reports with a click of a button for the accountant.

related_products.short_desc: Automate and integrate your processes to gain full control and visibility of your procurement operations with Pipefy.
related_products.features:
Gain full control and visibility of your procurement operations with Pipefy.

The process management platform helps you ensure requisitions and purchase orders are being processed quickly and accurately, and allows you to integrate your accounting software or other legacy tools to scale your operation. 

Build an error-proof procurement operation with digital workflows that reduce the risk of human error. Try Pipefy for free.

related_products.short_desc: Discover SAP S/4HANA Cloud, a complete ERP system with embedded AI and machine learning.
related_products.features: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is a complete enterprise resource planning (ERP) system with built-in intelligent technologies, including AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics. It helps companies adopt new business models, manage business change at speed, orchestrate internal and external resources, and use the predictive power of AI. Benefit from tight, native integration between processes, industry depth, and a consistent in-memory data model.

related_products.short_desc: RFP360 streamlines how you engage vendors, collaborate with colleagues, request information, issue RFPs and evaluate responses.
related_products.features: RFP360 empowers you to manage all RFPs and tenders in a template library, simplifying, standardizing and improving every request you issue. You can assign tasks, set deadlines, collaborate and communicate with stakeholders, suppliers and scorers in one solution. Our vendor evaluation features enable you to collect, score and compare RFP responses in a single view, driving more informed and objective buying decisions. And dashboards and reports offer insight into current and previous activity.

related_products.short_desc: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.
related_products.features: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.  Users can create purchase orders, submit them for approval, approve or reject them, and send them directly to vendors.  Users can also keep track of items and bills received from vendors.  Spendwise is web-based so you don't have to install software and you can access it from anywhere.  Visit our website for more information and sign up for a Free Trial and/or Demo!

related_products.short_desc: Save time and money by eliminating manual work. Streamlined approvals, real-time budgeting, PRs, POs, invoices - all in one software.
related_products.features: Gain overall control and visibility of your procurement workflow with a holistic cloud-based solution. Transform your time-consuming procurement operations into convenient and automated procedures. Document creation just in a few clicks. Approve documents 2,5x faster, and reduce manual data entry at least by 80%. Precoro provides integrations with NetSuite, Quickbooks, Amazon Business Punch-in, and a free API for implementing other accounting solutions.

related_products.short_desc: Procurify helps you gain unparalleled control and visibility with streamlined workflows, real-time data, and innovative features.
related_products.features: Procurify is the go to end-to-end procurement software that lets businesses track, control, and analyze all spending to simplify and scale their spend management process. Simple and easy to use, Procurify's intuitive interface empowers users to proactively track, control, and analyze spending. Keep all of your records centralized and reduce rogue spending with Amazon Business and Staples PunchOut integration. Procurify integrates seamlessly with Netsuite, Quickbooks and other ERP systems.

related_products.short_desc: The Asite Platform is cloud-based and enables seamless collaboration across disciplines, from concept to completion and beyond.
related_products.features:
The Asite Platform provides everyone across the construction supply chain access to key information regardless of location or device, enabling project teams to store and manage all data in one central and secure repository. 

The vast range of solutions Asite offers enable increased collaboration and efficiency both on the construction site and in the back-office. This results in fewer mistakes, delivering huge time and cost savings.

related_products.short_desc: Full purchasing workflow solution hosted in the cloud  from req-to-check many plugin options/integrations, and Global 24/7 Support.
related_products.features: Your complete purchase order workflow tool hosted in the Cloud. From point of requisition to placement of your order to the vendor  eBA has many features only found in more expensive solutions from online approvals, public RFPs, sealed vendor bidding, a receiving module, invoice matching, full legacy accounts integration, assets & inventory management, GDPR compliant, vendor portals the list goes on.  All in an easy to use simple interface  - see why we have the highest reviews,  contact us now.

similar_products.short_desc: Simplify your purchasing by centralizing it onto 1 platform with the proper guardrails in place to ensure compliance and cost savings.
similar_products.features: Order simplifies buying for businesses by centralizing it onto one platform. With Order, all the products your company needs to operate can be found in one place with the approval and budgeting guardrails needed to ensure compliance. Placing recurring orders is as simple as one click with saved product lists, and saving on purchases hasn't been easier with Order's $4 billion in purchasing power and strategic sourcing that ensures you always pay the lowest prices for your products.

similar_products.short_desc: Proactis drives true cost savings & efficiency in smart & powerful procurement solutions to simplify, track & analyze 100% of process.
similar_products.features: Over 3 million Proactis procurement users have realized faster time to value, scalability, and agility to move at the accelerating pace of change and procurement automation. Proactis significantly reduces costs and budget overruns with our market-leading procurement automation solution that unifies procurement and finance processes. You can now achieve real cost savings, spend control & visibility, & process improvements together in a smart, intuitive cloud platform. Schedule a free demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: Best-in-class procure-to-pay software for businesses that require ease of use, transparency, insights, and proactive spend controls.
similar_products.features: A cloud-based procure-to-pay solution for proactive spend management. Trusted by cross-industry organizations worldwide to automate procurement workflows and manage requisition-to-PO processes and expenses with multi-level approvals, budget control, policy compliance, AP workflow management, and spend analysis. Fraxion enables PunchOut and Catalog procurement with strategic vendors. Easy to use and effective as a standalone solution or with seamless ERP integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: Say goodbye to outdated Procure-to-Pay systems and hello to your modern procurement process with Teampay.
similar_products.features: Say goodbye to outdated Procure-to-Pay systems and modernize your procurement process. Teampay's intuitive purchasing software automates and simplifies all purchases from end-to-end. While finance teams maintain total control, managers and employees get real-time visibility into company spend and make quick, compliant purchases. Save time with automation, set proactive spend controls, issue payment methods instantly, and see rapid time-to-value.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your direct & indirect purchasing on your own private procurement platform. Free version available.
similar_products.features: Simple Procurement Software to manage all your company's spending. Tradogram provides configurable tools to streamline your Requisitions, Purchase Orders, RFQs/RFPs, Contracts, Receiving and Invoice Matching. Also, manage the process with User Permissions, Approvals, Budgets, Items Catalog, Supplier Management, Projects & much more. The latest cloud technology with top security & performance criteria. Get your FREE account today & see how easy it is to use!

similar_products.short_desc: Kissflow brings you the #1 Procurement cloud solution which is flexible and has purchasing to vendor management, all in one platform.
similar_products.features: Kissflow Procurement Cloud is the #1 flexible procurement solutions which has everything from purchasing to vendor management, all in one platform. It has all everything include Purchase Orders, Purchase Requisition, Vendor Management, Purchase Invoicing, Analytics, and Integrations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Purchasing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Purchasing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Purchasing software automates the procurement cycle for the purchasing of direct and indirect goods and services. These applications include important security, compliance and reporting features, enabling an accurate and efficient purchase order and requisition process. Purchasing solutions often offer integrated tools for invoice approval, inventory control, and asset management, as well as customer service and work order management. Purchasing software is related to Billing and Invoicing software, Procurement software and Vendor Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sourcing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sourcing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sourcing software helps procurement specialists manage RFPS and the requisition process from quoting to award and purchasing. Select and manage suppliers,create a competitive bidding process with auction tools, and track project savings with reporting dashboards. Buyers looking for Sourcing software may also be interested in Procurement software, Purchasing software, Supply Chain Management software, Vendor Management software, and Contract Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spend Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spend Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spend Management software helps companies track and report on actual expenditures as well as control these expenditures through tools that limit amounts that can be spent by employees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Supply Chain Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Supply Chain Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Supply Chain Management software automates the flow of processes from raw materials through to delivery of finished goods to the consumer. These applications allow for organization-wide order processing, transportation and warehouse management along with planning and forecasting tools. Supply Chain Management software provides for efficient operation through the distribution and synchronization of this key data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Supply Chain Management software is related to Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vendor Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vendor Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vendor Management software helps manage costs, track progress, and report on relationship and product quality of third-party vendors. When an organization uses multiple vendors, Vendor Management software can enhance productivity and collaboration of the vendor projects. This type of software often includes information databasing, vendor scoring, RFP and bidding functionality, and performance tracking. Vendor Management software is related to Contract Management software, Proposal Management software, Procurement software, and Purchasing software.

_source.features_tokenized_text: cataloging/categorization invoice_processing purchase_order_management sourcing_management spend_management supplier_management

related_products.short_desc: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money.
related_products.features: Spendwise is an affordable easy-to-use online system that helps you control spending saving you time and money. Users can create purchase orders, submit them for approval, approve or reject them, and send them directly to vendors. Users can also keep track of items and bills received from vendors. Spendwise is web-based so you don't have to install software and you can access it from anywhere. Visit our website for more information and sign up for a Free Trial and/or Demo!

related_products.short_desc: Optimize time-consuming processes with Precoro. Streamlined approvals, budgeting, automated PR, and PO processing within one platform.
related_products.features: Since 2015, Precoro has helped more than 1000 SMBs and Enterprises enhance purchasing operations by eliminating manual procurement processes. Transparent approval workflow, real-time budgeting, expense tracking, automated PR, and PO processing - all in one procurement software. Precoro provides integrations with Xero, NetSuite, Quickbooks, Amazon Business Punch-in, Slack, and free API for simple connection with other accounting and business tools.

related_products.short_desc: Smart and simple spend management for scaling businesses. Request, approve, receive, and pay from within one platform with Procurify.
related_products.features: Speed up purchasing and empower teams to buy what they need, when they need it, without the bottlenecks. The Procurify Platform brings all your purchasing and spend management needs together in one easy-to-use platform that fully integrates with your existing accounting systems. Maximize operational efficiency and increase spend visibility and control with comprehensive procure-to-pay workflows, 3-way matching, and custom approvals.

related_products.short_desc: AvidXchange's P2P solutions streamline workflows that generate purchase reporting, create electronic audit trails, & ensure compliance.
related_products.features: AvidXchange offers a complete suite of purchase-to-pay (PSP) solutions purpose-built for industries like real estate, HOA, construction, financial services and healthcare and social services. Our eProcurement software improves the procure-to-pay process from start to finish with over 220 integrations between our AP automation software and widely used accounting systems, meaning your current system can remain intact while streamlining your existing processes.

related_products.short_desc: Hybrent medical purchasing, inventory management and invoicing software integrates with most AP and clinical applications.
related_products.features: Hybrent healthcare supply chain software brings a low-cost, cloud-based procurement and inventory management system to ASCs, physician clinics, and post acute care organizations (LTC/SNF). One portal offers shopping, order automation, approvals, order tracking & confirmations, e-receive, invoice matching, contract management, AP and clinical integrations, reporting and more. Available for desktops, tablets and mobile devices. Read customer success stories on our website and request a demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Order (formerly Negotiatus) is a guided B2B marketplace with a mission to simplify buying for businesses.
related_products.features: Order (formerly Negotiatus) is a guided B2B marketplace with a mission to simplify buying for businesses. Order makes it easy for businesses to place and track purchases across all their vendors, control spend, and make all payments in a single, consolidated bill. Tailored insights and purchasing recommendations fuel smarter spending decisions so businesses can easily save time and money on what they need to grow.

related_products.short_desc: A best-in-class procure-to-pay solution for effective spend management, complete transparency, insights, and compliance.
related_products.features: Powerful procure-to-pay solutions for proactive spend management. Trusted by cross-industry organizations worldwide to automate procurement workflows and manage requisition-to-PO processes and expenses with multi-level approvals, budget control, policy compliance, and AP workflow management, and spend analysis. Fraxion enables PunchOut and Catalog procurement with strategic vendors. Easy to use and effective as standalone solutions or with seamless ERP integrations.

related_products.short_desc: Coupa's cloud native platform powers all the capabilities you need for Business Spend Management at scale.
related_products.features: Coupa's cloud-native suite of Business Spend Management applications lets customers gain visibility and control over their spend and supply chains. Customers get an end-to-end process that helps drive collaboration across procurement, finance, treasury, compliance, and supply chain leaders to help their companies spend smarter, mitigate risk, deliver on ESG commitments, and improve resilience.

related_products.short_desc: With PayEm, transcend P2P. Customize approval and reconciliation flows in a single PO. It's not P2P, it's request to reconciliation.
related_products.features: Go beyond traditional procure-to-pay (P2P) with PayEm. PayEm's platform offers P2P with custom approval flows that allow for the use of the payment method of your choice. PayEm also enables easy receipt collection, reconciliation, and PO creation, so procurement doesn't just end with payments. You can do all this within the context of a single PO, making PayEm a one-stop-shop. Really, PayEm takes P2P to its logical next level - we call it R2R: request to reconciliation.

related_products.short_desc: Web-based & mobile Procurement & AP Automation. Easy for users, effective for management, powerful for accounting. SaaS & On-Premise.
related_products.features: Robust Web-Based & Mobile Procurement that Automates Your Entire Procure-to-Pay. Requisition Mobile App, AP Automation, AI & OCR Invoice Capture, PunchOut, Catalog, Budget Compliance, PO Generation, Receiving, Unlimited Approval & Routing Rules, Vendor Portal & Contract Enforcement, Check Request, Multi-Company, RFQ. Standalone Software or Seamless Out-of-the-Box Integration with Microsoft Dynamics GP, AX, SL, Dynamics 365, Sage ERP, Sage Intacct, Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT, Acumatica and more

related_products.short_desc: Easy to use e-procurement solution that makes your procurement processes effortless. Save time, reduce costs, and have full visibility.
related_products.features:
Proqura is a powerful yet affordable procurement management software designed for small and medium sized businesses. 

We have helped hundreds of companies reduce manual paperwork, save time, and cut down costs by streamlining workflows, increasing compliance and transparency, and digitizing the entire procurement process. 

Proqura is feature-rich and simple to use. Create RFQs and RFPs, engage with suppliers, compare quotes, manage PRs and POs, and automate invoice matching, all in one place.

similar_products.short_desc: iQuantum -  AI/ML powered Global Corporate Procurement and Supplier Management Software.
similar_products.features: iQuantum is Modern Procurement for Today's Business. A modular discovery-to-pay supply chain platform, iQuantum provides customers access to the largest certified diverse supplier database, integrated AI/ML derived insights, as well as the agility to address current and future compliance requirements. Gain visibility into all spend, improve supplier relationships, simplify contract management, manage ESG compliance, and accomplish growth goals. Request for a demo to see iQuantum in action!

similar_products.short_desc: Kissflow brings you the #1 Procurement cloud solution which is flexible and has purchasing to vendor management, all in one platform.

It has all everything include Purchase Orders, Purchase Requisition, Vendor Management, Purchase Invoicing, Analytics, and Integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: Hybrent medical purchasing, inventory management and invoicing software integrates with most AP and clinical applications.
similar_products.features: Hybrent healthcare supply chain software brings a low-cost, cloud-based procurement and inventory management system to ASCs, physician clinics, and post acute care organizations (LTC/SNF). One portal offers shopping, order automation, approvals, order tracking & confirmations, e-receive, invoice matching, contract management, AP and clinical integrations, reporting and more. Available for desktops, tablets and mobile devices. Read customer success stories on our website and request a demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: SpendMap helps organizations automate and simplify their Purchasing processes. Free, Cloud and On-Premise versions available.
similar_products.features:
At SpendMap, we develop affordable yet remarkably capable software that helps you simplify your company's Purchasing process and eliminate frustration while saving you time and money.

While each module is optional, SpendMap automates things like Purchase Orders, requisitions and approvals, supplier invoice approval and inventory control. 

You need stuff to run your business.  We make it simple.

similar_products.short_desc: MissingLink is a fully managed e-commerce solution that allows companies to automate B2B sales channels.
similar_products.features: MissingLink is a service that automates the processing of procurement transactions between businesses, linking the buyers and sellers by leveraging industry best practices to bring transparency and efficiency to business processes.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based & mobile Procurement & AP Automation. Easy for users, effective for management, powerful for accounting. SaaS & On-Premise.

Requisition Mobile App, AP Automation, AI & OCR Invoice Capture, PunchOut, Catalog, Budget Compliance, PO Generation, Receiving, Unlimited Approval & Routing Rules, Vendor Portal & Contract Enforcement, Check Request, Multi-Company, RFQ. similar_products.short_desc: Sakon is on a mission to help enterprises organize and understand their complete communications ecosystem.
similar_products.features: Sakon is on a mission to help enterprises organize and understand their complete communications ecosystem. We put it all together  network and user-device inventory, invoices, and carrier contracts  to help reduce global costs, ensure invoice & payment accuracy, and leverage data to drive operational performance.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Payable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Payable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Payable software automates the process of controlling cash expenditures. These applications help improve cash management and reduce effort by tracking invoices, providing tools for capturing errors, and generating reports. Accounts Payable solutions are designed to work with General Ledger and Accounting applications. Accounts Payable software is related to Accounting software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Procurement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Procurement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Procurement software automates the purchasing process and manages all activities related to an organization's expenditures. Procurement applications automate the process of resource acquisition and supplier relationship management. Employees can easily create purchase orders subject to review and approval by managers. Managers have a broad range tools at their disposal for tracking, analysis and reporting on business process efficiency. Procurement software is related to Billing and Invoicing software, Purchasing software and Vendor Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Vendor Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Vendor Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Vendor Management software helps manage costs, track progress, and report on relationship and product quality of third-party vendors. When an organization uses multiple vendors, Vendor Management software can enhance productivity and collaboration of the vendor projects. This type of software often includes information databasing, vendor scoring, RFP and bidding functionality, and performance tracking. Vendor Management software is related to Contract Management software, Proposal Management software, Procurement software, and Purchasing software.
